package ${package};

import javax.annotation.Resource;
import com.vnetoo.common.service.BaseServiceImpl;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
${import}

/**
 * @comment ${tableComment}Service实现类
 * @author ${author}
 * @date ${sysdate} 
 */
@Service 
public class ${baseName}ServiceImpl extends BaseServiceImpl<${baseName}> implements ${baseName}Service{
	
	public ${baseName}DAO getDao() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		return (${baseName}DAO)super.dao;
	}
	
	@Resource(name="${baseName.lowerFirst}DAOImpl")
	public void setDao(${baseName}DAO dao) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		super.dao = dao;
	}
}
